DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim of this study is to investigate the possibility to replace an erythrocyte based prime solution with a crystalloid based prime solution while maintaining metabolic function. Secondary also to study if potentially reduced immunological influence is obtained during hyper thermic isolated limb perfusion with a crystalloid based prime solution.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Study Comparing Priming Solution Containing Crystalloid or Packed Red Blood Cells in Patients Treated With Isolated Limb Perfusion.
DOC.criteria: 1. The patient scheduled for treatment with isolated hyperthermic perfusion 2. Age over 18 years. 3. Signed informed consent
